name: Repo-Scientist
details: A web application that analyse the contribution of invidual in a github repository and display it in different charts accordingly.
It will counts the potential commits as per Jira ticket to track the progress and also implemented github Oauth for authentication.
Project go further for the term paper at Dalhousie University.
Wrote Backend logics to get the row data from APIs and to perform proper analysis for getting meaningful data.

name: code matcher
details: A fully functional, cloud based web application which allows user to find their matching taste of coding style date.
To increase the smoothness of UI, it is built with React and Material UI.
Used more than 5 cloud services such as AWS Lambada, CloudFront, Elastic BeanStalk, DynamoDB, SNS, S3 and Cognito
Wrote Cloud Formations to scale website with almost 0 down time.

name: Database management system
details: A functional and console based Distributed Database management system (Replication of MySQL).
It can parse the queries and perform task accordingly.
Used text files to store the data at low level.
Used java to write all the feature such as query parser, transaction, locks and authentication.

name: pawadoption
details: An android application to list and adopt a cats/pets.
Found need of this application, in one real life scenario and that spark this idea for application.
Shelter are the petkeeper who can list pet, their details and user can do application to adopt that pet, which can be evaluated by the shelter.
Integrated map to find nearest vets, implemented feature to book appointment for regular and emergency checkups.

name: B&B
details: A multi-cloud and serverless project with highest availability, resiliency and scalability to maintain a hotel.
Implemented room bookng and food ordering features acoording to availability.
Integrated chatbot which provide all the same services to book room, tour and order food.
Used services of AWS and GCP cloud to make it multi-cloud and serverless.

name: SolarX
details: A fully functional web application for selling renewable energy products such as solar products online.
An Organization can maintain inventory, price and can track all the sales through provided admin panel.
This web app is developed using React JS with Chakra UI to enhance the user interface and Express.js (Framework of NodeJs) as backend technology.
This website also has the features like Wallet and Cart.
